BRICS should accelerate the development of a new payment system. Creating an alternative for the Global South is essential. If BRICS does not establish this independent trade route soon, it will be too late.The BRICS nations cannot trust the US, as its foreign policy aims to expand Israeli influence and control the Middle East. The US has repeatedly tried and failed to control Russian oil, and its attempts to cripple the Russian economy to intimidate China have also failed.Now is the time to change the global order. By trading without the US dollar, we can avoid sanctions and develop the Global South. This new system will prevent other nations from bullying us.
